original_text:
Brazilian Beauty
Quando si pensa all’iconico immaginario del Brasile, vengono in mente molte cose. Splendide spiagge, immense foreste pluviali, lo sfarzo del Carnevale e lo stupefacente Cristo Redentore. E per molti, possiamo aggiungere un altro punto importante a questa lista: la rinomata bellezza delle donne brasiliane.
Brazilian Beauty è una slot machine online che è stata progettata per catturare molti degli aspetti iconici del Paese, non ultimo la sua bella gente. E anche se il gioco in sé potrebbe essere abbastanza semplice, è comunque molto divertente da giocare grazie ad un grande  bonus gratuito di Free Spins che può portare ai giocatori alcuni premi epici.
Brazilian Beauty è una slot a 5 rulli, 30 slot payline della WMS Gaming che può essere giocata da 30 centesimi a 150 euro a giro su tutti i dispositivi. Nato come unn popolare gioco da casinò fisico e successivamente passato alla versione online, questo gioco offre dei wilds che possono combinarsi per darvi dei moltiplicatori fino a 9x. Si tratta del Bonus Brazilian Beauty, dove potete accedere ad una funzione di respin e ad una funzione di giri gratis – quest’ultima vi dà fino a 40 giri gratis e premi in contanti fino a 300 volte la vostra puntata!
Una grafica carnevalesca
I simboli sui rulli includono maracas, flauti, fiori, tamburi, collane, copricapi, loghi della città (Rio presumo), bellezze (una signora in bikini) e il logo di Brazilian Beauty.
Brazilian Beauty è una slot machine WMS che fa parte della serie G+ dell’azienda. Si tratta della prima Slot Machine a tema Rio de Janeiro comparsa nei casinò fisici, periodo in cui ha ottenuto un record di soddisfazione dei clienti e di successo che aiuta a renderlo anche un gioco online molto attraente.
Le basi di questo gioco, come per la maggior parte delle slot, sono piuttosto semplici. Per prima cosa, è necessario selezionare quante linee e quante monete si desidera giocare. Poi, dovrete provare a far combaciare i simboli da sinistra a destra attraverso le linee di pagamento attive. Abbinerai una grande varietà di icone che sono tratte dalla cultura brasiliana: in particolare, noterai che questi simboli hanno molto a che fare con Rio de Janeiro e la celebrazione del Carnevale. Ci sono strumenti musicali, copricapi colorati e immagini della famosa spiaggia di Copacabana, tra le tante.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Ci sono un paio di simboli redditizi da cercare mentre si gioca su questa macchina. Per prima cosa, vi piacerà vedere le icone 3x wild, perché non solo aiutano a creare combinazioni vincenti, ma triplicano i vostri guadagni ogni volta che partecipano a una vittoria. Degni di nota sono anche i gettoni del sole fiammeggiante, che agiscono come una sorta di Scatter. Se riesci a colpirne tre o più di queste in qualsiasi punto dei rulli in un solo giro, attiverai uno speciale giro libero. Più soli vedi, più giri gratis guadagnerai!
Questo speciale round bonus include alcuni colpi di scena per aiutarti a guadagnare ancora più premi. Per prima cosa, vedrai una bella donna aggiunta ai rulli come uno dei simboli che puoi abbinare. Ogni due di questi che potrai raccogliere durante la funzione speciale ti assegnerà un premio bonus. Raccogli 20 di questi simboli nel corso delle tue scommesse, e riceverai un premio speciale enorme, con l’importo esatto del premio in base a quanto hai scommesso sul lancio. È anche possibile recuperare ulteriori giri gratuiti, mantenendo l’azione ancora più a lungo, in pieno stile megaways, l’ideale per chi vuole fare un sacco di soldi con le Slot Machine.
Il gioco è anche dotato di un bonus Brazilian Beauty che viene inserito quando si ottengono 3 o più Scatter di tipo Sun God, ossia la divinità che viene rappresentata con il sole. Una volta trovato questo simbolo potrai sperare in due funzioni bonus separate. La funzione Respin vede le bobine con il Dio Sole sparpagliarsi tenute con le altre bobine che ruotano – questo ti dà la possibilità di ottenere più Scatter per ottenere più giri gratis nella funzione successiva.
Nella funzione Free Spins, otterrete 10, 15 o 20 giri gratis per 3, 4 o 5 Sun God scatters. Se otterrete 3 o più Scatter durante la funzione, vincerete ulteriori giri gratuiti, il che significa che è possibile vincere fino a 40 Free Spins in totale. Attenzione allo Scatter della, che vi ricompenserà con premi in denaro.
Brazilian Beauty potrebbe non essere la slot machine più complicata mai creata, ma non lasciatevi ingannare: è comunque molto divertente da giocare.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se vi piace il tema, vale la pena giocare a Samba Carnival, la Slot Machine prodotta da Play ‘n Go. Con 5 rulli e 15 linee di pagamento, questo gioco di slot ispirato al carnevale è un gioco colorato in cui tutta l’azione è nel gioco base. Cercate 4 simboli wild che hanno ciascuno un valore moltiplicatore – le vincite che coinvolgono i wild sono soggette ad un moltiplicatore 5x. C’è anche una funzione di stile “pick me” dove puoi vincere fino a 150 volte la tua puntata.

raw_translation.response:
Experience the vibrant culture of Brazil with the online slot game, Brazilian Beauty. From the stunning beaches to the lush rainforest, this game captures the iconic imagery of this South American powerhouse. But perhaps what truly sets Brazilian Beauty apart is the undeniable allure of the country's beautiful women.

Don't let the game's simplicity fool you - this WMS Gaming creation will keep you entertained with its 5 reels and 30 paylines. With bets ranging from 30 cents to €150, the game features wilds that can multiply winnings up to 9x. But the real excitement lies in the Brazilian Beauty bonus, which offers respins and up to 40 free spins with cash prizes worth up to 300 times your initial wager!

Symbols include maracas, flutes, flowers, drums, necklaces, headdresses, city logos (presumably Rio), and of course, Brazilian beauties in bikinis. The G+ series game, originally found in physical casinos, has now gone digital and features graphics that truly embody the spirit of the Rio carnival.

Look out for the 3x wild symbols which can triple your earnings, and the flaming sun tokens that act as a Scatter. Three or more sun tokens activate the special free spin round, where collecting two beautiful woman symbols can earn you a bonus prize. Collect 20 such symbols in a single bet, and you win a special prize, the amount of which depends on your initial wager. Keep spinning for even more chances to win and experience the full megaways style gameplay.

But the real fun begins when you trigger the Brazilian Beauty bonus with three or more sun god Scatters. The respin feature sees the reels with the sun god symbols held while the others continue spinning, leading to more Scatter symbols and more free spins. During free spins, you can earn 10, 15, or 20 rounds depending on the number of sun god Scatters, and additional Scatters can reward you with up to 40 free spins total. Keep an eye out for the Scatter symbol which can reward you with cash prizes.

Though not the most complicated game, Brazilian Beauty is certainly one of the most enjoyable. If you're looking for similar games, try Samba Carnival, a 5-reel, 15-payline slot from Play 'n Go. With its carnival theme and colorful graphics, this game features wild symbols with 5x multipliers, as well as a pick-me bonus that can award up to 150 times the initial wager.

raw_translation.response:
Brazilian Beauty

When one thinks of the iconic imagery of Brazil, many things come to mind. Beautiful beaches, immense rainforests, the splendor of Carnival and the astonishing Cristo Redentor. And for many, we can add another important point to this list: the renowned beauty of Brazilian women.

Brazilian Beauty is an online slot machine designed to capture many of the iconic aspects of the country, not least its beautiful people. And even though the game itself may be fairly simple, it is still a lot of fun to play thanks to a great Free Spins bonus that can lead players to some epic prizes.

Brazilian Beauty is a 5-reel, 30 payline slot machine from WMS Gaming that can be played from 30 cents to 150 euros per spin on all devices. Originally a popular physical casino game and later moved onto the online version, this game offers wilds that can combine to give you multipliers up to 9x. The Brazilian Beauty Bonus is where you can access a respin feature and a free spins feature - the latter giving you up to 40 free spins and cash prizes up to 300 times your bet!

A Carnival-style graphic
Symbols on the reels include maracas, flutes, flowers, drums, necklaces, headgear, city logos (I assume Rio), beauties (a lady in a bikini) and the Brazilian Beauty logo.

Brazilian Beauty is a WMS slot machine that is part of the company's G+ series. It is the first Rio de Janeiro-themed slot machine to appear in physical casinos, a period during which it achieved record customer satisfaction and success that helps make it an attractive online game as well.

The basics of this game, as with most slots, are fairly simple. First, you need to select how many lines and coins you want to play. Then, you have to try to match the symbols from left to right across the active paylines. You will match a wide variety of icons that are drawn from Brazilian culture: in particular, you will notice that these symbols have a lot to do with Rio de Janeiro and the celebration of Carnival. There are musical instruments, colorful headgear, and images of the famous Copacabana beach, among others.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine
There are a couple of profitable symbols to look for while playing on this machine. First, you will enjoy seeing the 3x wild icons, because they not only help create winning combinations, but also triple your earnings every time they participate in a win. Also noteworthy are the blazing sun tokens, which act as a kind of Scatter. If you manage to hit three or more of these anywhere on the reels in a single spin, you will trigger a special free spin. The more suns you see, the more free spins you will earn!

This special bonus round includes some twists to help you earn even more prizes. First, you will see a beautiful lady added to the reels as one of the symbols you can match. Every two of these that you can collect during the special feature will earn you a bonus prize. Collect 20 of these symbols over the course of your bets, and you will receive a huge special prize, with the exact amount of the prize depending on how much you bet on the spin. You can also recover additional free spins, keeping the action going even longer, in full megaways style, ideal for those who want to make a lot of money with Slot Machines.

The game also features a Brazilian Beauty bonus that is triggered when you get 3 or more Sun God Scatters, i.e., the deity represented by the sun. Once you find this symbol, you can hope for two separate bonus features. The Respin feature sees the reels with the Sun God scattered held while the other reels spin - this gives you the chance to get more Scatters to get more free spins in the next feature.

In the Free Spins feature, you will get 10, 15, or 20 free spins for 3, 4, or 5 Sun God Scatters. If you get 3 or more Scatters during the feature, you will win additional free spins, meaning you can win up to 40 free spins in total. Beware of the Scatter, which will reward you with cash prizes.

Brazilian Beauty may not be the most complicated slot machine ever created, but don't be fooled: it's still a lot of fun to play.

Similar Slot Machines
If you like the theme, it's worth playing Samba Carnival, the slot machine produced by Play 'n Go. With 5 reels and 15 paylines, this Carnival-inspired slot game is a colorful game where all the action is in the base game. Look for 4 wild symbols that each have a multiplier value - wins involving wilds are subject to a 5x multiplier. There's also a "pick me" style feature where you can win up to 150 times your bet.

Review: Brazilian Beauty

When one thinks of the iconic imagery of Brazil, many things come to mind. Beautiful beaches, immense rainforests, the splendor of Carnival and the astonishing Cristo Redentor. And for many, we can add another important point to this list: the renowned beauty of Brazilian women.

Brazilian Beauty is an online slot machine designed to capture many of the iconic aspects of the country, not least its beautiful people. And even though the game itself may be fairly simple, it is still a lot of fun to play thanks to a great Free Spins bonus that can lead players to some epic prizes.

Brazilian Beauty is a 5-reel, 30 payline slot machine from WMS Gaming that can be played from 30 cents to 150 euros per spin on all devices. Originally a popular physical casino game and later moved onto the online version, this game offers wilds that can combine to give you multipliers up to 9x. The Brazilian Beauty Bonus is where you can access a respin feature and a free spins feature - the latter giving you up to 40 free spins and cash prizes up to 300 times your bet!

A Carnival-style graphic
Symbols on the reels include maracas, flutes, flowers, drums, necklaces, headgear, city logos (I assume Rio), beauties (a lady in a bikini) and the Brazilian Beauty logo.

Brazilian Beauty is a WMS slot machine that is part of the company's G+ series. It is the first Rio de Janeiro-themed slot machine to appear in physical casinos, a period during which it achieved record customer satisfaction and success that helps make it an attractive online game as well.

The basics of this game, as with most slots, are fairly simple. First, you need to select how many lines and coins you want to play. Then, you have to try to match the symbols from left to right across the active paylines. You will match a wide variety of icons that are drawn from Brazilian culture: in particular, you will notice that these symbols have a lot to do with Rio de Janeiro and the celebration of Carnival. There are musical instruments, colorful headgear, and images of the famous Copacabana beach, among others.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine
There are a couple of profitable symbols to look for while playing on this machine. First, you will enjoy seeing the 3x wild icons, because they not only help create winning combinations, but also triple your earnings every time they participate in a win. Also noteworthy are the blazing sun tokens, which act as a kind of Scatter. If you manage to hit three or more of these anywhere on the reels in a single spin, you will trigger a special free spin. The more suns you see, the more free spins you will earn!

This special bonus round includes some twists to help you earn even more prizes. First, you will see a beautiful lady added to the reels as one of the symbols you can match. Every two of these that you can collect during the special feature will earn you a bonus prize. Collect 20 of these symbols over the course of your bets, and you will receive a huge special prize, with the exact amount of the prize depending on how much you bet on the spin. You can also recover additional free spins, keeping the action going even longer, in full megaways style, ideal for those who want to make a lot of money with Slot Machines.

The game also features a Brazilian Beauty bonus that is triggered when you get 3 or more Sun God Scatters, i.e., the deity represented by the sun. Once you find this symbol, you can hope for two separate bonus features. The Respin feature sees the reels with the Sun God scattered held while the other reels spin - this gives you the chance to get more Scatters to get more free spins in the next feature.

In the Free Spins feature, you will get 10, 15, or 20 free spins for 3, 4, or 5 Sun God Scatters. If you get 3 or more Scatters during the feature, you will win additional free spins, meaning you can win up to 40 free spins in total. Beware of the Scatter, which will reward you with cash prizes.

Brazilian Beauty may not be the most complicated slot machine ever created, but don't be fooled: it's still a lot of fun to play.

Similar Slot Machines
If you like the theme, it's worth playing Samba Carnival, the slot machine produced by Play 'n Go. With 5 reels and 15 paylines, this Carnival-inspired slot game is a colorful game where all the action is in the base game. Look for 4 wild symbols that each have a multiplier value - wins involving wilds are subject to a 5x multiplier. There's also a "pick me" style feature where you can win up to 150 times your bet.
